title: Spatiotemporal development of the neuronal accumulation of amyloid precursor protein and the amyloid plaque formation in the brain of 3xTg-AD mice

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 7

Author(s): Munenori Ono, Tetsufumi Ito, Sachiko Yamaki, Yoshie Hori, Qing Zhou, Xirun Zhao, Shinji Muramoto, Ryo Yamamoto, Takafumi Furuyama, Hiromi Sakata-Haga, Toshihisa Hatta, Tsuyoshi Hamaguchi, Nobuo Kato
